```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
knitr::knit_engines$set(list(
  styler = function(options) {
    options$comment <- ""
    knitr::engine_output(
      options,
      
      c("# Bad", options$code),
      c("# Good", styler::style_text(options$code))
    )
  }
))
```
